column4: for the ubuntu netbook remix? you cant do that..its over 700mb in size
Oh, I see. I guess they need to trim the fat, then.
you can enable compiz on the UNR. but it can conflict with the special UNR interface.
That may be, but they decided to promote a few use cases and make the others impossible. Now I can no longer click on the bar to scroll a screenful or middle click to scroll to that point
